chunks.text:
C1314975January 25, 2023
DHRUVIL DARJI
We're excited to present your NVIDIA offer!
Your offer letter/employment agreement contains the full terms and conditions. We 
have included the highlights summarized below1.
Employing Entity NVIDIA Corporation
Your Position Senior System Software Engineer
Your Manager Bhanu Velukuru
Your Location US, CA, Santa Clara
Anticipated Start Date March 6, 2023
Annualized Base Pay USD 185,000
Total Offer Bonus USD 27,000
If you have any questions about your offer, please contact your recruiter. 
NVIDIA Corporation Stock Grant (RSUs)
You will also be recommended to receive the following discretionary grant from NVIDIA Corporation.
Grant Value USD 300,000
1 Any incentive pay or variable compensation, bonuses, and/or relocation packages are subject to the terms and conditions of the relevant NVIDIA plan, which may be 
provided to you at a later date. All amounts are stated on a gross basis and may be subject to tax withholdings and other deductions under applicable law. In case of any 
conflict between this summary and the [offer letter/employment agreement], the [offer letter/employment agreement] will govern.
We look forward to you joining the team
